ayah: الٓرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ
ayah_translit: alif-lam-ra til'ka ayatu al-kitabi al-hakimi
ayah_english: Alif Lam Ra These (are the) verses (of) the Book the wise

ayah: أَكَانَ لِلنَّاسِ عَجَبًا أَنۡ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ رَجُلٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَنۡ أَنذِرِ ٱلنَّاسَ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَنَّ لَهُمۡ قَدَمَ صِدۡقٍ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡۗ قَالَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٞ مُّبِينٌ
ayah_translit: akana lilnnasi ajaban an awhayna ila rajulin min'hum an andhiri al-nasa wabashiri alladhina amanu anna lahum qadama sid'qin inda rabbihim qala al-kafiruna inna hadha lasahirun mubinun
ayah_english: Is it for the mankind a wonder that We revealed to a man from (among) them that Warn the mankind and give glad tidings (to) those who believe that for them (will be) (a respectable) position a respectable (position) near their Lord Said the disbelievers Indeed this (is) surely a magician obvious

ayah_translit: akana lilnnasi ajaban an awhayna ila rajulin min'hum an andhiri al-nasa wabashiri alladhina amanu anna lahum qadama sid'qin inda rabbihim qala al-kafiruna inna hadha lasahirun mubinun
ayah_english: Is it for the mankind a wonder that We revealed to a man from (among) them that Warn the mankind and give glad tidings (to) those who believe that for them (will be) (a respectable) position a respectable (position) near their Lord Said the disbelievers Indeed this (is) surely a magician obvious

ayah: إِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِۖ يُدَبِّرُ ٱلۡأَمۡرَۖ مَا مِن شَفِيعٍ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ إِذۡنِهِۦۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ فَٱعۡبُدُوهُۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: inna rabbakumu al-lahu alladhi khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ala al-'arshi yudabbiru al-amra ma min shafi'in illa min ba'di idh'nihi dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum fa-u'buduhu afala tadhakkaruna
ayah_english: Indeed your Lord (is) Allah the One Who created the heavens and the earth in six periods then He established on the Throne disposing the affairs Not (is) any intercessor (is) any intercessor except after after His permission That (is) Allah your Lord so worship Him Then will not you remember

ayah: إِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِۖ يُدَبِّرُ ٱلۡأَمۡرَۖ مَا مِن شَفِيعٍ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ إِذۡنِهِۦۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ فَٱعۡبُدُوهُۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: inna rabbakumu al-lahu alladhi khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ala al-'arshi yudabbiru al-amra ma min shafi'in illa min ba'di idh'nihi dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum fa-u'buduhu afala tadhakkaruna
ayah_english: Indeed your Lord (is) Allah the One Who created the heavens and the earth in six periods then He established on the Throne disposing the affairs Not (is) any intercessor (is) any intercessor except after after His permission That (is) Allah your Lord so worship Him Then will not you remember

ayah: إِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِۖ يُدَبِّرُ ٱلۡأَمۡرَۖ مَا مِن شَفِيعٍ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ إِذۡنِهِۦۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ فَٱعۡبُدُوهُۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: inna rabbakumu al-lahu alladhi khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ala al-'arshi yudabbiru al-amra ma min shafi'in illa min ba'di idh'nihi dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum fa-u'buduhu afala tadhakkaruna
ayah_english: Indeed your Lord (is) Allah the One Who created the heavens and the earth in six periods then He established on the Throne disposing the affairs Not (is) any intercessor (is) any intercessor except after after His permission That (is) Allah your Lord so worship Him Then will not you remember

ayah: إِلَيۡهِ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ جَمِيعٗاۖ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقًّاۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَهُمۡ شَرَابٞ مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ وَعَذَابٌ أَلِيمُۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡفُرُونَ
ayah_translit: ilayhi marji'ukum jami'an wa'da al-lahi haqqan innahu yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu liyajziya alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati bil-qis'ti wa-alladhina kafaru lahum sharabun min hamimin wa'adhabun alimun bima kanu yakfuruna
ayah_english: To Him (will be) your return [all] Promise (of) Allah (is) true Indeed He originates the creation then He repeats it that He may reward those who believed and did the good deeds in justice But those who disbelieved for them (will be) a drink of boiling fluids and a punishment painful because they used (to) disbelieve

ayah: إِلَيۡهِ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ جَمِيعٗاۖ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقًّاۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَهُمۡ شَرَابٞ مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ وَعَذَابٌ أَلِيمُۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡفُرُونَ

ayah: إِلَيۡهِ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ جَمِيعٗاۖ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقًّاۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَهُمۡ شَرَابٞ مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ وَعَذَابٌ أَلِيمُۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡفُرُونَ

ayah: إِلَيۡهِ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ جَمِيعٗاۖ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقًّاۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَهُمۡ شَرَابٞ مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ وَعَذَابٌ أَلِيمُۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡفُرُونَ
ayah_translit: ilayhi marji'ukum jami'an wa'da al-lahi haqqan innahu yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu liyajziya alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati bil-qis'ti wa-alladhina kafaru lahum sharabun min hamimin wa'adhabun alimun bima kanu yakfuruna
ayah_english: To Him (will be) your return [all] Promise (of) Allah (is) true Indeed He originates the creation then He repeats it that He may reward those who believed and did the good deeds in justice But those who disbelieved for them (will be) a drink of boiling fluids and a punishment painful because they used (to) disbelieve

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ ضِيَآءٗ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ نُورٗا وَقَدَّرَهُۥ مَنَازِلَ لِتَعۡلَمُواْ عَدَدَ ٱلسِّنِينَ وَٱلۡحِسَابَۚ مَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ ذَٰلِكَ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ يُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi ja'ala al-shamsa diyaan wal-qamara nuran waqaddarahu manazila lita'lamu adada al-sinina wal-hisaba ma khalaqa al-lahu dhalika illa bil-haqi yufassilu al-ayati liqawmin ya'lamuna
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who made the sun a shining light and the moon a reflected light and determined for it phases that you may know (the) number (of) the years and the count (of time) Not created Allah that except in truth He explains the Signs for a people (who) know

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ ضِيَآءٗ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ نُورٗا وَقَدَّرَهُۥ مَنَازِلَ لِتَعۡلَمُواْ عَدَدَ ٱلسِّنِينَ وَٱلۡحِسَابَۚ مَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ ذَٰلِكَ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ يُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah_english: He (is) the One Who made the sun a shining light and the moon a reflected light and determined for it phases that you may know (the) number (of) the years and the count (of time) Not created Allah that except in truth He explains the Signs for a people (who) know

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ ضِيَآءٗ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ نُورٗا وَقَدَّرَهُۥ مَنَازِلَ لِتَعۡلَمُواْ عَدَدَ ٱلسِّنِينَ وَٱلۡحِسَابَۚ مَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ ذَٰلِكَ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ يُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: إِنَّ فِي ٱخۡتِلَٰفِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَّقُونَ
ayah_translit: inna fi ikh'tilafi al-layli wal-nahari wama khalaqa al-lahu fi al-samawati wal-ardi laayatin liqawmin yattaquna
ayah_english: Indeed in (the) alternation (of) the night and the day and what (has been) created (by) Allah in the heavens and the earth (are) Signs for a people who are God conscious

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا وَرَضُواْ بِٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱطۡمَأَنُّواْ بِهَا وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا غَٰفِلُونَ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina la yarjuna liqaana waradu bil-hayati al-dun'ya wa-it'ma-annu biha wa-alladhina hum an ayatina ghafiluna
ayah_english: Indeed those who (do) not expect the meeting with Us and are pleased with the life (of) the world and feel satisfied with it and those they (are) of Our Signs heedless

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا وَرَضُواْ بِٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱطۡمَأَنُّواْ بِهَا وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا غَٰفِلُونَ

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا وَرَضُواْ بِٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱطۡمَأَنُّواْ بِهَا وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا غَٰفِلُونَ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina la yarjuna liqaana waradu bil-hayati al-dun'ya wa-it'ma-annu biha wa-alladhina hum an ayatina ghafiluna

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
ayah_translit: ulaika mawahumu al-naru bima kanu yaksibuna
ayah_english: Those their abode (will be) the Fire for what they used (to) earn

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ يَهۡدِيهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِإِيمَٰنِهِمۡۖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ فِي جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati yahdihim rabbuhum biimanihim tajri min tahtihimu al-anharu fi jannati al-na'imi
ayah_english: Indeed those who believed and did good deeds (will) guide them their Lord by their faith Will flow from underneath them the rivers in Gardens (of) Delight

ayah: دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ فِيهَا سُبۡحَٰنَكَ ٱللَّهُمَّ وَتَحِيَّتُهُمۡ فِيهَا سَلَٰمٞۚ وَءَاخِرُ دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ أَنِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: da'wahum fiha sub'hanaka al-lahuma watahiyyatuhum fiha salamun waakhiru da'wahum ani al-hamdu lillahi rabbi al-'alamina
ayah_english: Their prayer therein (will be) Glory be to You O Allah! And their greeting therein (will be) Peace And the last (of) their call (will be) [that] All the Praise be to Allah Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ فِيهَا سُبۡحَٰنَكَ ٱللَّهُمَّ وَتَحِيَّتُهُمۡ فِيهَا سَلَٰمٞۚ وَءَاخِرُ دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ أَنِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

ayah_english: Their prayer therein (will be) Glory be to You O Allah! And their greeting therein (will be) Peace And the last (of) their call (will be) [that] All the Praise be to Allah Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ فِيهَا سُبۡحَٰنَكَ ٱللَّهُمَّ وَتَحِيَّتُهُمۡ فِيهَا سَلَٰمٞۚ وَءَاخِرُ دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ أَنِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

ayah_translit: da'wahum fiha sub'hanaka al-lahuma watahiyyatuhum fiha salamun waakhiru da'wahum ani al-hamdu lillahi rabbi al-'alamina
ayah_english: Their prayer therein (will be) Glory be to You O Allah! And their greeting therein (will be) Peace And the last (of) their call (will be) [that] All the Praise be to Allah Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: ۞وَلَوۡ يُعَجِّلُ ٱللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ ٱلشَّرَّ ٱسۡتِعۡجَالَهُم بِٱلۡخَيۡرِ لَقُضِيَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ أَجَلُهُمۡۖ فَنَذَرُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ
ayah_translit: walaw yu'ajjilu al-lahu lilnnasi al-shara is'ti'jalahum bil-khayri laqudiya ilayhim ajaluhum fanadharu alladhina la yarjuna liqaana fi tugh'yanihim ya'mahuna
ayah_english: And if hastens (by) Allah for the mankind the evil (as) He hastens for them the good surely, would have been decreed for them their term But We leave those who (do) not expect the meeting with Us in their transgression wandering blindly

ayah: ۞وَلَوۡ يُعَجِّلُ ٱللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ ٱلشَّرَّ ٱسۡتِعۡجَالَهُم بِٱلۡخَيۡرِ لَقُضِيَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ أَجَلُهُمۡۖ فَنَذَرُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ

ayah: ۞وَلَوۡ يُعَجِّلُ ٱللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ ٱلشَّرَّ ٱسۡتِعۡجَالَهُم بِٱلۡخَيۡرِ لَقُضِيَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ أَجَلُهُمۡۖ فَنَذَرُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ
ayah_translit: walaw yu'ajjilu al-lahu lilnnasi al-shara is'ti'jalahum bil-khayri laqudiya ilayhim ajaluhum fanadharu alladhina la yarjuna liqaana fi tugh'yanihim ya'mahuna

ayah: وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ ٱلضُّرُّ دَعَانَا لِجَنۢبِهِۦٓ أَوۡ قَاعِدًا أَوۡ قَآئِمٗا فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُ ضُرَّهُۥ مَرَّ كَأَن لَّمۡ يَدۡعُنَآ إِلَىٰ ضُرّٖ مَّسَّهُۥۚ كَذَٰلِكَ زُيِّنَ لِلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha massa al-insana al-duru da'ana lijanbihi aw qa'idan aw qaiman falamma kashafna anhu durrahu marra ka-an lam yad'una ila durrin massahu kadhalika zuyyina lil'mus'rifina ma kanu ya'maluna
ayah_english: And when touches the man the affliction he calls Us (lying) on his side or sitting or standing But when We remove from him his affliction he passes on as if he (had) not called Us for (the) affliction (that) touched him Thus (it) is made fair seeming to the extravagant what they used (to) do

ayah: وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ ٱلضُّرُّ دَعَانَا لِجَنۢبِهِۦٓ أَوۡ قَاعِدًا أَوۡ قَآئِمٗا فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُ ضُرَّهُۥ مَرَّ كَأَن لَّمۡ يَدۡعُنَآ إِلَىٰ ضُرّٖ مَّسَّهُۥۚ كَذَٰلِكَ زُيِّنَ لِلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ ٱلضُّرُّ دَعَانَا لِجَنۢبِهِۦٓ أَوۡ قَاعِدًا أَوۡ قَآئِمٗا فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُ ضُرَّهُۥ مَرَّ كَأَن لَّمۡ يَدۡعُنَآ إِلَىٰ ضُرّٖ مَّسَّهُۥۚ كَذَٰلِكَ زُيِّنَ لِلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا ٱلۡقُرُونَ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ لَمَّا ظَلَمُواْ وَجَآءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَمَا كَانُواْ لِيُؤۡمِنُواْۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
ayah_translit: walaqad ahlakna al-quruna min qablikum lamma zalamu wajaathum rusuluhum bil-bayinati wama kanu liyu'minu kadhalika najzi al-qawma al-muj'rimina
ayah_english: And verily We destroyed the generations before you before you when they wronged and came to them their Messengers with clear proofs but not they were to believe Thus We recompense the people (who are) criminals

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا ٱلۡقُرُونَ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ لَمَّا ظَلَمُواْ وَجَآءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَمَا كَانُواْ لِيُؤۡمِنُواْۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا ٱلۡقُرُونَ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ لَمَّا ظَلَمُواْ وَجَآءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَمَا كَانُواْ لِيُؤۡمِنُواْۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

ayah: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰكُمۡ خَلَـٰٓئِفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ لِنَنظُرَ كَيۡفَ تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: thumma ja'alnakum khalaifa fi al-ardi min ba'dihim linanzura kayfa ta'maluna
ayah_english: Then We made you successors in the earth after them after them so that We may see how you do

ayah: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَاتُنَا بَيِّنَٰتٖ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا ٱئۡتِ بِقُرۡءَانٍ غَيۡرِ هَٰذَآ أَوۡ بَدِّلۡهُۚ قُلۡ مَا يَكُونُ لِيٓ أَنۡ أُبَدِّلَهُۥ مِن تِلۡقَآيِٕ نَفۡسِيٓۖ إِنۡ أَتَّبِعُ إِلَّا مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّۖ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ إِنۡ عَصَيۡتُ رَبِّي عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
ayah_translit: wa-idha tut'la alayhim ayatuna bayyinatin qala alladhina la yarjuna liqaana i'ti biqur'anin ghayri hadha aw baddil'hu qul ma yakunu li an ubaddilahu min til'qai nafsi in attabi'u illa ma yuha ilayya inni akhafu in asaytu rabbi adhaba yawmin azimin
ayah_english: And when are recited to them Our Verses (as) clear proofs said those who (do) not hope (for the) meeting (with) Us Bring us a Quran other (than) this or change it Say Not (it) is for me that I change it of my own accord my own accord Not I follow except what is revealed to me Indeed, I [I] fear if I were to disobey my Lord (the) punishment (of) a Day Great

ayah_translit: wa-idha tut'la alayhim ayatuna bayyinatin qala alladhina la yarjuna liqaana i'ti biqur'anin ghayri hadha aw baddil'hu qul ma yakunu li an ubaddilahu min til'qai nafsi in attabi'u illa ma yuha ilayya inni akhafu in asaytu rabbi adhaba yawmin azimin

ayah_english: And when are recited to them Our Verses (as) clear proofs said those who (do) not hope (for the) meeting (with) Us Bring us a Quran other (than) this or change it Say Not (it) is for me that I change it of my own accord my own accord Not I follow except what is revealed to me Indeed, I [I] fear if I were to disobey my Lord (the) punishment (of) a Day Great

ayah: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَاتُنَا بَيِّنَٰتٖ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا ٱئۡتِ بِقُرۡءَانٍ غَيۡرِ هَٰذَآ أَوۡ بَدِّلۡهُۚ قُلۡ مَا يَكُونُ لِيٓ أَنۡ أُبَدِّلَهُۥ مِن تِلۡقَآيِٕ نَفۡسِيٓۖ إِنۡ أَتَّبِعُ إِلَّا مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّۖ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ إِنۡ عَصَيۡتُ رَبِّي عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

ayah: قُل لَّوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَا تَلَوۡتُهُۥ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَلَآ أَدۡرَىٰكُم بِهِۦۖ فَقَدۡ لَبِثۡتُ فِيكُمۡ عُمُرٗا مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦٓۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: qul law shaa al-lahu ma talawtuhu alaykum wala adrakum bihi faqad labith'tu fikum umuran min qablihi afala ta'qiluna
ayah_english: Say If (had) willed Allah not I (would) have recited it to you and not He (would) have made it known to you He (would) have made it known to you Verily I have stayed among you a lifetime before it before it Then will not you use reason

ayah: قُل لَّوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَا تَلَوۡتُهُۥ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَلَآ أَدۡرَىٰكُم بِهِۦۖ فَقَدۡ لَبِثۡتُ فِيكُمۡ عُمُرٗا مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦٓۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

ayah: فَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوۡ كَذَّبَ بِـَٔايَٰتِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
ayah_translit: faman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban aw kadhaba biayatihi innahu la yuf'lihu al-muj'rimuna
ayah_english: So who (is) more wrong than he who invents against Allah a lie or denies His Signs Indeed not will succeed the criminals

ayah: فَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوۡ كَذَّبَ بِـَٔايَٰتِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

ayah: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَضُرُّهُمۡ وَلَا يَنفَعُهُمۡ وَيَقُولُونَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ شُفَعَـٰٓؤُنَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ قُلۡ أَتُنَبِّـُٔونَ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا لَا يَعۡلَمُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
ayah_translit: waya'buduna min duni al-lahi ma la yadurruhum wala yanfa'uhum wayaquluna haulai shufa'auna inda al-lahi qul atunabbiuna al-laha bima la ya'lamu fi al-samawati wala fi al-ardi sub'hanahu wata'ala amma yush'rikuna
ayah_english: And they worship from other than Allah that (which) (does) not harm them and not benefit them and they say These (are) our intercessors with Allah Say Do you inform Allah of what not he knows in the heavens and not in the earth Glorified is He and Exalted above what they associate (with Him)

ayah: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَضُرُّهُمۡ وَلَا يَنفَعُهُمۡ وَيَقُولُونَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ شُفَعَـٰٓؤُنَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ قُلۡ أَتُنَبِّـُٔونَ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا لَا يَعۡلَمُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

ayah: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَضُرُّهُمۡ وَلَا يَنفَعُهُمۡ وَيَقُولُونَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ شُفَعَـٰٓؤُنَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ قُلۡ أَتُنَبِّـُٔونَ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا لَا يَعۡلَمُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ ٱلنَّاسُ إِلَّآ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَٱخۡتَلَفُواْۚ وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ فِيمَا فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ
ayah_translit: wama kana al-nasu illa ummatan wahidatan fa-ikh'talafu walawla kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika laqudiya baynahum fima fihi yakhtalifuna
ayah_english: And not was the mankind but a community one then they differed And had (it) not been a word (that) preceded from your Lord surely, it (would) have been judged between them concerning what [therein] they differ

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ ٱلنَّاسُ إِلَّآ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَٱخۡتَلَفُواْۚ وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ فِيمَا فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ
ayah_translit: wama kana al-nasu illa ummatan wahidatan fa-ikh'talafu walawla kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika laqudiya baynahum fima fihi yakhtalifuna

ayah_english: And not was the mankind but a community one then they differed And had (it) not been a word (that) preceded from your Lord surely, it (would) have been judged between them concerning what [therein] they differ

ayah: وَيَقُولُونَ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦۖ فَقُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡغَيۡبُ لِلَّهِ فَٱنتَظِرُوٓاْ إِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُنتَظِرِينَ
ayah_translit: wayaquluna lawla unzila alayhi ayatun min rabbihi faqul innama al-ghaybu lillahi fa-intaziru inni ma'akum mina al-muntazirina
ayah_english: And they say Why not is sent down to him a Sign from his Lord So say Only the unseen (is) for Allah so wait indeed I am with you among the ones who wait

ayah: وَيَقُولُونَ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦۖ فَقُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡغَيۡبُ لِلَّهِ فَٱنتَظِرُوٓاْ إِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُنتَظِرِينَ

ayah: وَإِذَآ أَذَقۡنَا ٱلنَّاسَ رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ ضَرَّآءَ مَسَّتۡهُمۡ إِذَا لَهُم مَّكۡرٞ فِيٓ ءَايَاتِنَاۚ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَسۡرَعُ مَكۡرًاۚ إِنَّ رُسُلَنَا يَكۡتُبُونَ مَا تَمۡكُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha adhaqna al-nasa rahmatan min ba'di darraa massathum idha lahum makrun fi ayatina quli al-lahu asra'u makran inna rusulana yaktubuna ma tamkuruna
ayah_english: And when We let [the] mankind taste We let [the] mankind taste mercy after after adversity has touched them behold They have a plot against Our Verses Say Allah (is) more swift (in) planning Indeed Our Messengers write down what you plot

ayah: وَإِذَآ أَذَقۡنَا ٱلنَّاسَ رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ ضَرَّآءَ مَسَّتۡهُمۡ إِذَا لَهُم مَّكۡرٞ فِيٓ ءَايَاتِنَاۚ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَسۡرَعُ مَكۡرًاۚ إِنَّ رُسُلَنَا يَكۡتُبُونَ مَا تَمۡكُرُونَ

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُسَيِّرُكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا كُنتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ وَجَرَيۡنَ بِهِم بِرِيحٖ طَيِّبَةٖ وَفَرِحُواْ بِهَا جَآءَتۡهَا رِيحٌ عَاصِفٞ وَجَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡجُ مِن كُلِّ مَكَانٖ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ أُحِيطَ بِهِمۡ دَعَوُاْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ لَئِنۡ أَنجَيۡتَنَا مِنۡ هَٰذِهِۦ لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi yusayyirukum fi al-bari wal-bahri hatta idha kuntum fi al-ful'ki wajarayna bihim birihin tayyibatin wafarihu biha jaatha rihun asifun wajaahumu al-mawju min kulli makanin wazannu annahum uhita bihim da'awu al-laha mukh'lisina lahu al-dina la-in anjaytana min hadhihi lanakunanna mina al-shakirina
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who enables you to travel in the land and the sea until when you are in the ships and they sail with them with a wind good and they rejoice therein comes to it a wind stormy and comes to them the waves from every place and they assume that they are surrounded with them They call Allah sincerely to Him (in) the religion (saying) If You save us from this surely we will be among the thankful

ayah_english: He (is) the One Who enables you to travel in the land and the sea until when you are in the ships and they sail with them with a wind good and they rejoice therein comes to it a wind stormy and comes to them the waves from every place and they assume that they are surrounded with them They call Allah sincerely to Him (in) the religion (saying) If You save us from this surely we will be among the thankful

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُسَيِّرُكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا كُنتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ وَجَرَيۡنَ بِهِم بِرِيحٖ طَيِّبَةٖ وَفَرِحُواْ بِهَا جَآءَتۡهَا رِيحٌ عَاصِفٞ وَجَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡجُ مِن كُلِّ مَكَانٖ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ أُحِيطَ بِهِمۡ دَعَوُاْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ لَئِنۡ أَنجَيۡتَنَا مِنۡ هَٰذِهِۦ لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi yusayyirukum fi al-bari wal-bahri hatta idha kuntum fi al-ful'ki wajarayna bihim birihin tayyibatin wafarihu biha jaatha rihun asifun wajaahumu al-mawju min kulli makanin wazannu annahum uhita bihim da'awu al-laha mukh'lisina lahu al-dina la-in anjaytana min hadhihi lanakunanna mina al-shakirina
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who enables you to travel in the land and the sea until when you are in the ships and they sail with them with a wind good and they rejoice therein comes to it a wind stormy and comes to them the waves from every place and they assume that they are surrounded with them They call Allah sincerely to Him (in) the religion (saying) If You save us from this surely we will be among the thankful

ayah_english: He (is) the One Who enables you to travel in the land and the sea until when you are in the ships and they sail with them with a wind good and they rejoice therein comes to it a wind stormy and comes to them the waves from every place and they assume that they are surrounded with them They call Allah sincerely to Him (in) the religion (saying) If You save us from this surely we will be among the thankful

ayah: فَلَمَّآ أَنجَىٰهُمۡ إِذَا هُمۡ يَبۡغُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّۗ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّمَا بَغۡيُكُمۡ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِكُمۖ مَّتَٰعَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ فَنُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: falamma anjahum idha hum yabghuna fi al-ardi bighayri al-haqi yaayyuha al-nasu innama baghyukum ala anfusikum mata'a al-hayati al-dun'ya thumma ilayna marji'ukum fanunabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna
ayah_english: But when He saved them behold They rebel in the earth without [the] right O mankind O mankind Only your rebellion (is) against yourselves (the) enjoyment (of) the life (of) the world Then to Us (is) your return and We will inform you of what you used (to) do

ayah_translit: falamma anjahum idha hum yabghuna fi al-ardi bighayri al-haqi yaayyuha al-nasu innama baghyukum ala anfusikum mata'a al-hayati al-dun'ya thumma ilayna marji'ukum fanunabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna

ayah: إِنَّمَا مَثَلُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا كَمَآءٍ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَٱخۡتَلَطَ بِهِۦ نَبَاتُ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِمَّا يَأۡكُلُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمُ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ زُخۡرُفَهَا وَٱزَّيَّنَتۡ وَظَنَّ أَهۡلُهَآ أَنَّهُمۡ قَٰدِرُونَ عَلَيۡهَآ أَتَىٰهَآ أَمۡرُنَا لَيۡلًا أَوۡ نَهَارٗا فَجَعَلۡنَٰهَا حَصِيدٗا كَأَن لَّمۡ تَغۡنَ بِٱلۡأَمۡسِۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: innama mathalu al-hayati al-dun'ya kamain anzalnahu mina al-samai fa-ikh'talata bihi nabatu al-ardi mimma yakulu al-nasu wal-an'amu hatta idha akhadhati al-ardu zukh'rufaha wa-izzayyanat wazanna ahluha annahum qadiruna alayha ataha amruna laylan aw naharan faja'alnaha hasidan ka-an lam taghna bil-amsi kadhalika nufassilu al-ayati liqawmin yatafakkaruna
ayah_english: Only (the) example (of) the life (of) the world (is) like (the) water which We sent down from the sky so absorbs [with] it (the) plants (of) the earth from which eat the men and the cattle until when takes the earth its adornment and is beautified and think its people that they have the power over it comes (to) it Our command (by) night or (by) day and We make it a harvest clean-mown as if not it had flourished yesterday Thus We explain the Signs for a people who reflect

ayah: إِنَّمَا مَثَلُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا كَمَآءٍ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَٱخۡتَلَطَ بِهِۦ نَبَاتُ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِمَّا يَأۡكُلُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمُ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ زُخۡرُفَهَا وَٱزَّيَّنَتۡ وَظَنَّ أَهۡلُهَآ أَنَّهُمۡ قَٰدِرُونَ عَلَيۡهَآ أَتَىٰهَآ أَمۡرُنَا لَيۡلًا أَوۡ نَهَارٗا فَجَعَلۡنَٰهَا حَصِيدٗا كَأَن لَّمۡ تَغۡنَ بِٱلۡأَمۡسِۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ

ayah: إِنَّمَا مَثَلُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا كَمَآءٍ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَٱخۡتَلَطَ بِهِۦ نَبَاتُ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِمَّا يَأۡكُلُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمُ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ زُخۡرُفَهَا وَٱزَّيَّنَتۡ وَظَنَّ أَهۡلُهَآ أَنَّهُمۡ قَٰدِرُونَ عَلَيۡهَآ أَتَىٰهَآ أَمۡرُنَا لَيۡلًا أَوۡ نَهَارٗا فَجَعَلۡنَٰهَا حَصِيدٗا كَأَن لَّمۡ تَغۡنَ بِٱلۡأَمۡسِۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: innama mathalu al-hayati al-dun'ya kamain anzalnahu mina al-samai fa-ikh'talata bihi nabatu al-ardi mimma yakulu al-nasu wal-an'amu hatta idha akhadhati al-ardu zukh'rufaha wa-izzayyanat wazanna ahluha annahum qadiruna alayha ataha amruna laylan aw naharan faja'alnaha hasidan ka-an lam taghna bil-amsi kadhalika nufassilu al-ayati liqawmin yatafakkaruna
ayah_english: Only (the) example (of) the life (of) the world (is) like (the) water which We sent down from the sky so absorbs [with] it (the) plants (of) the earth from which eat the men and the cattle until when takes the earth its adornment and is beautified and think its people that they have the power over it comes (to) it Our command (by) night or (by) day and We make it a harvest clean-mown as if not it had flourished yesterday Thus We explain the Signs for a people who reflect

ayah: إِنَّمَا مَثَلُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا كَمَآءٍ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَٱخۡتَلَطَ بِهِۦ نَبَاتُ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِمَّا يَأۡكُلُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمُ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ زُخۡرُفَهَا وَٱزَّيَّنَتۡ وَظَنَّ أَهۡلُهَآ أَنَّهُمۡ قَٰدِرُونَ عَلَيۡهَآ أَتَىٰهَآ أَمۡرُنَا لَيۡلًا أَوۡ نَهَارٗا فَجَعَلۡنَٰهَا حَصِيدٗا كَأَن لَّمۡ تَغۡنَ بِٱلۡأَمۡسِۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: innama mathalu al-hayati al-dun'ya kamain anzalnahu mina al-samai fa-ikh'talata bihi nabatu al-ardi mimma yakulu al-nasu wal-an'amu hatta idha akhadhati al-ardu zukh'rufaha wa-izzayyanat wazanna ahluha annahum qadiruna alayha ataha amruna laylan aw naharan faja'alnaha hasidan ka-an lam taghna bil-amsi kadhalika nufassilu al-ayati liqawmin yatafakkaruna

ayah: إِنَّمَا مَثَلُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا كَمَآءٍ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَٱخۡتَلَطَ بِهِۦ نَبَاتُ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِمَّا يَأۡكُلُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمُ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ زُخۡرُفَهَا وَٱزَّيَّنَتۡ وَظَنَّ أَهۡلُهَآ أَنَّهُمۡ قَٰدِرُونَ عَلَيۡهَآ أَتَىٰهَآ أَمۡرُنَا لَيۡلًا أَوۡ نَهَارٗا فَجَعَلۡنَٰهَا حَصِيدٗا كَأَن لَّمۡ تَغۡنَ بِٱلۡأَمۡسِۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: innama mathalu al-hayati al-dun'ya kamain anzalnahu mina al-samai fa-ikh'talata bihi nabatu al-ardi mimma yakulu al-nasu wal-an'amu hatta idha akhadhati al-ardu zukh'rufaha wa-izzayyanat wazanna ahluha annahum qadiruna alayha ataha amruna laylan aw naharan faja'alnaha hasidan ka-an lam taghna bil-amsi kadhalika nufassilu al-ayati liqawmin yatafakkaruna

ayah: إِنَّمَا مَثَلُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا كَمَآءٍ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَٱخۡتَلَطَ بِهِۦ نَبَاتُ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِمَّا يَأۡكُلُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمُ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ زُخۡرُفَهَا وَٱزَّيَّنَتۡ وَظَنَّ أَهۡلُهَآ أَنَّهُمۡ قَٰدِرُونَ عَلَيۡهَآ أَتَىٰهَآ أَمۡرُنَا لَيۡلًا أَوۡ نَهَارٗا فَجَعَلۡنَٰهَا حَصِيدٗا كَأَن لَّمۡ تَغۡنَ بِٱلۡأَمۡسِۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: innama mathalu al-hayati al-dun'ya kamain anzalnahu mina al-samai fa-ikh'talata bihi nabatu al-ardi mimma yakulu al-nasu wal-an'amu hatta idha akhadhati al-ardu zukh'rufaha wa-izzayyanat wazanna ahluha annahum qadiruna alayha ataha amruna laylan aw naharan faja'alnaha hasidan ka-an lam taghna bil-amsi kadhalika nufassilu al-ayati liqawmin yatafakkaruna

ayah: إِنَّمَا مَثَلُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا كَمَآءٍ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَٱخۡتَلَطَ بِهِۦ نَبَاتُ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِمَّا يَأۡكُلُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمُ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ زُخۡرُفَهَا وَٱزَّيَّنَتۡ وَظَنَّ أَهۡلُهَآ أَنَّهُمۡ قَٰدِرُونَ عَلَيۡهَآ أَتَىٰهَآ أَمۡرُنَا لَيۡلًا أَوۡ نَهَارٗا فَجَعَلۡنَٰهَا حَصِيدٗا كَأَن لَّمۡ تَغۡنَ بِٱلۡأَمۡسِۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: innama mathalu al-hayati al-dun'ya kamain anzalnahu mina al-samai fa-ikh'talata bihi nabatu al-ardi mimma yakulu al-nasu wal-an'amu hatta idha akhadhati al-ardu zukh'rufaha wa-izzayyanat wazanna ahluha annahum qadiruna alayha ataha amruna laylan aw naharan faja'alnaha hasidan ka-an lam taghna bil-amsi kadhalika nufassilu al-ayati liqawmin yatafakkaruna
ayah_english: Only (the) example (of) the life (of) the world (is) like (the) water which We sent down from the sky so absorbs [with] it (the) plants (of) the earth from which eat the men and the cattle until when takes the earth its adornment and is beautified and think its people that they have the power over it comes (to) it Our command (by) night or (by) day and We make it a harvest clean-mown as if not it had flourished yesterday Thus We explain the Signs for a people who reflect

ayah: وَٱللَّهُ يَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ دَارِ ٱلسَّلَٰمِ وَيَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
ayah_translit: wal-lahu yad'u ila dari al-salami wayahdi man yashau ila siratin mus'taqimin
ayah_english: And Allah calls to (the) Home (of) the Peace and guides whom He wills to (the) straight path (the) straight path

ayah: وَٱللَّهُ يَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ دَارِ ٱلسَّلَٰمِ وَيَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

ayah: ۞لِّلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ وَزِيَادَةٞۖ وَلَا يَرۡهَقُ وُجُوهَهُمۡ قَتَرٞ وَلَا ذِلَّةٌۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
ayah_translit: lilladhina ahsanu al-hus'na waziyadatun wala yarhaqu wujuhahum qatarun wala dhillatun ulaika ashabu al-janati hum fiha khaliduna
ayah_english: For those who do good (is) the best and more And not (will) cover their faces dust and not humiliation Those (are the) companions (of) Paradise they in it (will) abide forever

ayah: ۞لِّلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ وَزِيَادَةٞۖ وَلَا يَرۡهَقُ وُجُوهَهُمۡ قَتَرٞ وَلَا ذِلَّةٌۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَسَبُواْ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ جَزَآءُ سَيِّئَةِۭ بِمِثۡلِهَا وَتَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۖ مَّا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۡ عَاصِمٖۖ كَأَنَّمَآ أُغۡشِيَتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ قِطَعٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ مُظۡلِمًاۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina kasabu al-sayiati jazau sayyi-atin bimith'liha watarhaquhum dhillatun ma lahum mina al-lahi min asimin ka-annama ugh'shiyat wujuhuhum qita'an mina al-layli muz'liman ulaika ashabu al-nari hum fiha khaliduna
ayah_english: And those who earned the evil deeds (the) recompense (of) an evil deed (is) like it and (will) cover them humiliation They will not have They will not have from Allah any defender As if had been covered their faces (with) pieces from the darkness (of) night the darkness (of) night Those (are the) companions (of) the Fire they in it (will) abide forever

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَسَبُواْ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ جَزَآءُ سَيِّئَةِۭ بِمِثۡلِهَا وَتَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۖ مَّا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۡ عَاصِمٖۖ كَأَنَّمَآ أُغۡشِيَتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ قِطَعٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ مُظۡلِمًاۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَسَبُواْ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ جَزَآءُ سَيِّئَةِۭ بِمِثۡلِهَا وَتَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۖ مَّا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۡ عَاصِمٖۖ كَأَنَّمَآ أُغۡشِيَتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ قِطَعٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ مُظۡلِمًاۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُهُمۡ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ نَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ أَشۡرَكُواْ مَكَانَكُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَشُرَكَآؤُكُمۡۚ فَزَيَّلۡنَا بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ وَقَالَ شُرَكَآؤُهُم مَّا كُنتُمۡ إِيَّانَا تَعۡبُدُونَ
ayah_translit: wayawma nahshuruhum jami'an thumma naqulu lilladhina ashraku makanakum antum washurakaukum fazayyalna baynahum waqala shurakauhum ma kuntum iyyana ta'buduna
ayah_english: And (the) Day We will gather them all together then We will say to those who associate partners (with Allah) (Remain in) your place you and your partners Then We will separate [between] them and (will) say their partners Not you used (to) worship us worship us

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُهُمۡ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ نَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ أَشۡرَكُواْ مَكَانَكُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَشُرَكَآؤُكُمۡۚ فَزَيَّلۡنَا بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ وَقَالَ شُرَكَآؤُهُم مَّا كُنتُمۡ إِيَّانَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

ayah_english: And (the) Day We will gather them all together then We will say to those who associate partners (with Allah) (Remain in) your place you and your partners Then We will separate [between] them and (will) say their partners Not you used (to) worship us worship us

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُهُمۡ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ نَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ أَشۡرَكُواْ مَكَانَكُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَشُرَكَآؤُكُمۡۚ فَزَيَّلۡنَا بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ وَقَالَ شُرَكَآؤُهُم مَّا كُنتُمۡ إِيَّانَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

ayah: فَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدَۢا بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ إِن كُنَّا عَنۡ عِبَادَتِكُمۡ لَغَٰفِلِينَ
ayah_translit: fakafa bil-lahi shahidan baynana wabaynakum in kunna an ibadatikum laghafilina
ayah_english: So sufficient (is) Allah (as) a witness between us and between you that we were of your worship certainly unaware

ayah: هُنَالِكَ تَبۡلُواْ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّآ أَسۡلَفَتۡۚ وَرُدُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَوۡلَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡحَقِّۖ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ
ayah_translit: hunalika tablu kullu nafsin ma aslafat waruddu ila al-lahi mawlahumu al-haqi wadalla anhum ma kanu yaftaruna
ayah_english: There will be put to trial every soul (for) what it did previously and they will be returned to Allah their Lord the true and will be lost from them what they used (to) invent

ayah: هُنَالِكَ تَبۡلُواْ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّآ أَسۡلَفَتۡۚ وَرُدُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَوۡلَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡحَقِّۖ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

ayah: هُنَالِكَ تَبۡلُواْ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّآ أَسۡلَفَتۡۚ وَرُدُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَوۡلَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡحَقِّۖ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ
ayah_translit: hunalika tablu kullu nafsin ma aslafat waruddu ila al-lahi mawlahumu al-haqi wadalla anhum ma kanu yaftaruna
ayah_english: There will be put to trial every soul (for) what it did previously and they will be returned to Allah their Lord the true and will be lost from them what they used (to) invent

ayah: قُلۡ مَن يَرۡزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمَّن يَمۡلِكُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَمَن يُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡحَيَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَيِّتِ وَيُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡمَيِّتَ مِنَ ٱلۡحَيِّ وَمَن يُدَبِّرُ ٱلۡأَمۡرَۚ فَسَيَقُولُونَ ٱللَّهُۚ فَقُلۡ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayah_translit: qul man yarzuqukum mina al-samai wal-ardi amman yamliku al-sam'a wal-absara waman yukh'riju al-haya mina al-mayiti wayukh'riju al-mayita mina al-hayi waman yudabbiru al-amra fasayaquluna al-lahu faqul afala tattaquna
ayah_english: Say Who provides for you from the sky and the earth Or who controls the hearing and the sight And who brings out the living from the dead and brings forth the dead from the living And who disposes the affairs Then they will say Allah Then say Then will not you fear (Him)

ayah: فَذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَاذَا بَعۡدَ ٱلۡحَقِّ إِلَّا ٱلضَّلَٰلُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصۡرَفُونَ
ayah_translit: fadhalikumu al-lahu rabbukumu al-haqu famadha ba'da al-haqi illa al-dalalu fa-anna tus'rafuna
ayah_english: For that (is) Allah your Lord the true So what (can be) after the truth except the error So how (are) you turned away

ayah: فَذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَاذَا بَعۡدَ ٱلۡحَقِّ إِلَّا ٱلضَّلَٰلُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصۡرَفُونَ

ayah: كَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ فَسَقُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: kadhalika haqqat kalimatu rabbika ala alladhina fasaqu annahum la yu'minuna
ayah_english: Thus (is) proved true (the) Word (of) your Lord upon those who defiantly disobeyed that they (will) not believe

ayah: قُلۡ هَلۡ مِن شُرَكَآئِكُم مَّن يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥۚ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ
ayah_translit: qul hal min shurakaikum man yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu quli al-lahu yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu fa-anna tu'fakuna
ayah_english: Say Is (there) of your partners (any) who originates the creation then repeats it Say Allah originates the creation then repeats it So how you are deluded

ayah: قُلۡ هَلۡ مِن شُرَكَآئِكُم مَّن يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥۚ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ

ayah_translit: qul hal min shurakaikum man yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu quli al-lahu yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu fa-anna tu'fakuna
ayah_english: Say Is (there) of your partners (any) who originates the creation then repeats it Say Allah originates the creation then repeats it So how you are deluded

ayah: قُلۡ هَلۡ مِن شُرَكَآئِكُم مَّن يَهۡدِيٓ إِلَى ٱلۡحَقِّۚ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يَهۡدِي لِلۡحَقِّۗ أَفَمَن يَهۡدِيٓ إِلَى ٱلۡحَقِّ أَحَقُّ أَن يُتَّبَعَ أَمَّن لَّا يَهِدِّيٓ إِلَّآ أَن يُهۡدَىٰۖ فَمَا لَكُمۡ كَيۡفَ تَحۡكُمُونَ
ayah_translit: qul hal min shurakaikum man yahdi ila al-haqi quli al-lahu yahdi lil'haqqi afaman yahdi ila al-haqi ahaqqu an yuttaba'a amman la yahiddi illa an yuh'da fama lakum kayfa tahkumuna
ayah_english: Say Is (there) of your partners (any) who guides to the truth Say Allah guides to the truth Is then (he) who guides to the truth more worthy that he should be followed or (he) who (does) not guide unless [that] he is guided Then what (is) for you how you judge

ayah_translit: qul hal min shurakaikum man yahdi ila al-haqi quli al-lahu yahdi lil'haqqi afaman yahdi ila al-haqi ahaqqu an yuttaba'a amman la yahiddi illa an yuh'da fama lakum kayfa tahkumuna

ayah: وَمَا يَتَّبِعُ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ إِلَّا ظَنًّاۚ إِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِمَا يَفۡعَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wama yattabi'u aktharuhum illa zannan inna al-zana la yugh'ni mina al-haqi shayan inna al-laha alimun bima yaf 'aluna
ayah_english: And not follow most of them except assumption Indeed the assumption (does) not avail against the truth anything Indeed Allah (is) All-Knower of what they do

ayah: وَمَا يَتَّبِعُ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ إِلَّا ظَنًّاۚ إِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِمَا يَفۡعَلُونَ

ayah: وَمَا يَتَّبِعُ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ إِلَّا ظَنًّاۚ إِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِمَا يَفۡعَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wama yattabi'u aktharuhum illa zannan inna al-zana la yugh'ni mina al-haqi shayan inna al-laha alimun bima yaf 'aluna
ayah_english: And not follow most of them except assumption Indeed the assumption (does) not avail against the truth anything Indeed Allah (is) All-Knower of what they do

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ أَن يُفۡتَرَىٰ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَٰكِن تَصۡدِيقَ ٱلَّذِي بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ وَتَفۡصِيلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ مِن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: wama kana hadha al-qur'anu an yuf'tara min duni al-lahi walakin tasdiqa alladhi bayna yadayhi watafsila al-kitabi la rayba fihi min rabbi al-'alamina
ayah_english: And not is this the Quran that (it could be) produced by other than Allah other than Allah but (it is) a confirmation (of that) which (was) before it (was) before it and a detailed explanation (of) the Book (there is) no doubt in it from (the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ أَن يُفۡتَرَىٰ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَٰكِن تَصۡدِيقَ ٱلَّذِي بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ وَتَفۡصِيلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ مِن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

ayah: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ ٱفۡتَرَىٰهُۖ قُلۡ فَأۡتُواْ بِسُورَةٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦ وَٱدۡعُواْ مَنِ ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: am yaquluna if'tarahu qul fatu bisuratin mith'lihi wa-id'u mani is'tata'tum min duni al-lahi in kuntum sadiqina
ayah_english: Or (do) they say He has invented it Say Then bring a Surah like it and call whoever you can besides Allah besides Allah besides Allah if you are truthful

ayah: بَلۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِمَا لَمۡ يُحِيطُواْ بِعِلۡمِهِۦ وَلَمَّا يَأۡتِهِمۡ تَأۡوِيلُهُۥۚ كَذَٰلِكَ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: bal kadhabu bima lam yuhitu bi'il'mihi walamma yatihim tawiluhu kadhalika kadhaba alladhina min qablihim fa-unzur kayfa kana aqibatu al-zalimina
ayah_english: Nay they denied what not they could encompass (of) its knowledge and not has come (to) them its interpretation Thus denied those before them before them then see how was (the) end (of) the wrongdoers

ayah: بَلۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِمَا لَمۡ يُحِيطُواْ بِعِلۡمِهِۦ وَلَمَّا يَأۡتِهِمۡ تَأۡوِيلُهُۥۚ كَذَٰلِكَ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

ayah: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يُؤۡمِنُ بِهِۦ وَمِنۡهُم مَّن لَّا يُؤۡمِنُ بِهِۦۚ وَرَبُّكَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ
ayah_translit: wamin'hum man yu'minu bihi wamin'hum man la yu'minu bihi warabbuka a'lamu bil-muf'sidina
ayah_english: And of them (is one) who believes in it and of them (is one) who (does) not believe in it And your Lord (is) All-Knower of the corrupters

ayah_english: And of them (is one) who believes in it and of them (is one) who (does) not believe in it And your Lord (is) All-Knower of the corrupters

ayah: وَإِن كَذَّبُوكَ فَقُل لِّي عَمَلِي وَلَكُمۡ عَمَلُكُمۡۖ أَنتُم بَرِيٓـُٔونَ مِمَّآ أَعۡمَلُ وَأَنَا۠ بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-in kadhabuka faqul li amali walakum amalukum antum bariuna mimma a'malu wa-ana barion mimma ta'maluna
ayah_english: And if they deny you then say For me (are) my deeds and for you (are) your deeds You (are) disassociated from what I do and I am disassociated from what you do

ayah: وَإِن كَذَّبُوكَ فَقُل لِّي عَمَلِي وَلَكُمۡ عَمَلُكُمۡۖ أَنتُم بَرِيٓـُٔونَ مِمَّآ أَعۡمَلُ وَأَنَا۠ بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-in kadhabuka faqul li amali walakum amalukum antum bariuna mimma a'malu wa-ana barion mimma ta'maluna
ayah_english: And if they deny you then say For me (are) my deeds and for you (are) your deeds You (are) disassociated from what I do and I am disassociated from what you do

ayah: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَسۡتَمِعُونَ إِلَيۡكَۚ أَفَأَنتَ تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: wamin'hum man yastami'una ilayka afa-anta tus'mi'u al-suma walaw kanu la ya'qiluna
ayah_english: And among them (are some) who listen to you But (can) you cause the deaf to hear cause the deaf to hear even though they [were] (do) not use reason

ayah: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَسۡتَمِعُونَ إِلَيۡكَۚ أَفَأَنتَ تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

ayah: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَنظُرُ إِلَيۡكَۚ أَفَأَنتَ تَهۡدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيَ وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يُبۡصِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wamin'hum man yanzuru ilayka afa-anta tahdi al-'um'ya walaw kanu la yub'siruna
ayah_english: And among them (are some) who look at you But (can) you guide the blind even though they [were] (do) not see

ayah: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَظۡلِمُ ٱلنَّاسَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلنَّاسَ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: inna al-laha la yazlimu al-nasa shayan walakinna al-nasa anfusahum yazlimuna
ayah_english: Indeed Allah (does) not wrong the people (in) anything but the people wrong themselves wrong themselves

ayah_english: Indeed Allah (does) not wrong the people (in) anything but the people wrong themselves wrong themselves

ayah_translit: inna al-laha la yazlimu al-nasa shayan walakinna al-nasa anfusahum yazlimuna
ayah_english: Indeed Allah (does) not wrong the people (in) anything but the people wrong themselves wrong themselves

ayah_english: Indeed Allah (does) not wrong the people (in) anything but the people wrong themselves wrong themselves

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡ كَأَن لَّمۡ يَلۡبَثُوٓاْ إِلَّا سَاعَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلنَّهَارِ يَتَعَارَفُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ قَدۡ خَسِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِلِقَآءِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُهۡتَدِينَ
ayah_translit: wayawma yahshuruhum ka-an lam yalbathu illa sa'atan mina al-nahari yata'arafuna baynahum qad khasira alladhina kadhabu biliqai al-lahi wama kanu muh'tadina
ayah_english: And the Day He will gather them as if they had not remained they had not remained except an hour of the day they will recognize each other between them Certainly (will have) lost those who denied the meeting (with) Allah and not they were the guided ones

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡ كَأَن لَّمۡ يَلۡبَثُوٓاْ إِلَّا سَاعَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلنَّهَارِ يَتَعَارَفُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ قَدۡ خَسِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِلِقَآءِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُهۡتَدِينَ

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡ كَأَن لَّمۡ يَلۡبَثُوٓاْ إِلَّا سَاعَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلنَّهَارِ يَتَعَارَفُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ قَدۡ خَسِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِلِقَآءِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُهۡتَدِينَ
ayah_translit: wayawma yahshuruhum ka-an lam yalbathu illa sa'atan mina al-nahari yata'arafuna baynahum qad khasira alladhina kadhabu biliqai al-lahi wama kanu muh'tadina
ayah_english: And the Day He will gather them as if they had not remained they had not remained except an hour of the day they will recognize each other between them Certainly (will have) lost those who denied the meeting (with) Allah and not they were the guided ones

ayah: وَإِمَّا نُرِيَنَّكَ بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي نَعِدُهُمۡ أَوۡ نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ فَإِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُهُمۡ ثُمَّ ٱللَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-imma nuriyannaka ba'da alladhi na'iduhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-ilayna marji'uhum thumma al-lahu shahidun ala ma yaf 'aluna
ayah_english: And whether We show you some (of) that which We promised them or We cause you to die then to Us (is) their return then Allah (is) a Witness over what they do

ayah: وَإِمَّا نُرِيَنَّكَ بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي نَعِدُهُمۡ أَوۡ نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ فَإِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُهُمۡ ثُمَّ ٱللَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ

ayah: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٖ رَّسُولٞۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ رَسُولُهُمۡ قُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُم بِٱلۡقِسۡطِ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: walikulli ummatin rasulun fa-idha jaa rasuluhum qudiya baynahum bil-qis'ti wahum la yuz'lamuna
ayah_english: And for every nation (is) a Messenger So when comes their Messenger it will be judged between them in justice and they (will) not be wronged

ayah: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٖ رَّسُولٞۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ رَسُولُهُمۡ قُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُم بِٱلۡقِسۡطِ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ

ayah: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: wayaquluna mata hadha al-wa'du in kuntum sadiqina
ayah_english: And they say When (will) this the promise (be fulfilled) if you are truthful

ayah: قُل لَّآ أَمۡلِكُ لِنَفۡسِي ضَرّٗا وَلَا نَفۡعًا إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۗ لِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلٌۚ إِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَـٔۡخِرُونَ سَاعَةٗ وَلَا يَسۡتَقۡدِمُونَ
ayah_translit: qul la amliku linafsi darran wala naf 'an illa ma shaa al-lahu likulli ummatin ajalun idha jaa ajaluhum fala yastakhiruna sa'atan wala yastaqdimuna
ayah_english: Say Not I have power for myself (for) any harm and not (for) any profit except what Allah wills Allah wills For every nation (is) a term When comes their term then not they remain behind an hour and not they can precede (it)

ayah: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَتَىٰكُمۡ عَذَابُهُۥ بَيَٰتًا أَوۡ نَهَارٗا مَّاذَا يَسۡتَعۡجِلُ مِنۡهُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
ayah_translit: qul ara-aytum in atakum adhabuhu bayatan aw naharan madha yasta'jilu min'hu al-muj'rimuna
ayah_english: Say Do you see if comes to you His punishment (by) night or (by) day what (portion) of it would (wish to) hasten of it would (wish to) hasten the criminals

ayah: أَثُمَّ إِذَا مَا وَقَعَ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦٓۚ ءَآلۡـَٰٔنَ وَقَدۡ كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ
ayah_translit: athumma idha ma waqa'a amantum bihi al'ana waqad kuntum bihi tasta'jiluna
ayah_english: Is (it) then when when (it had) occurred you (will) believe in it Now And certainly you were seeking to hasten it seeking to hasten it

ayah: ثُمَّ قِيلَ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ هَلۡ تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡسِبُونَ
ayah_translit: thumma qila lilladhina zalamu dhuqu adhaba al-khul'di hal tuj'zawna illa bima kuntum taksibuna
ayah_english: Then it will be said to those who wronged Taste punishment the everlasting Are you (being) recompensed Are you (being) recompensed except for what you used (to) earn

ayah: ۞وَيَسۡتَنۢبِـُٔونَكَ أَحَقٌّ هُوَۖ قُلۡ إِي وَرَبِّيٓ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقّٞۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ
ayah_translit: wayastanbiunaka ahaqqun huwa qul i warabbi innahu lahaqqun wama antum bimu'jizina
ayah_english: And they ask you to inform Is it true Is it true Say Yes by my Lord Indeed, it (is) surely the truth and not you (can) escape (it)
word_tranlation: And they ask you to inform

ayah: ۞وَيَسۡتَنۢبِـُٔونَكَ أَحَقٌّ هُوَۖ قُلۡ إِي وَرَبِّيٓ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقّٞۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ
ayah_translit: wayastanbiunaka ahaqqun huwa qul i warabbi innahu lahaqqun wama antum bimu'jizina

ayah_translit: wayastanbiunaka ahaqqun huwa qul i warabbi innahu lahaqqun wama antum bimu'jizina
ayah_english: And they ask you to inform Is it true Is it true Say Yes by my Lord Indeed, it (is) surely the truth and not you (can) escape (it)

ayah: وَلَوۡ أَنَّ لِكُلِّ نَفۡسٖ ظَلَمَتۡ مَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَٱفۡتَدَتۡ بِهِۦۗ وَأَسَرُّواْ ٱلنَّدَامَةَ لَمَّا رَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَۖ وَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُم بِٱلۡقِسۡطِ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: walaw anna likulli nafsin zalamat ma fi al-ardi la-if'tadat bihi wa-asarru al-nadamata lamma ra-awu al-'adhaba waqudiya baynahum bil-qis'ti wahum la yuz'lamuna
ayah_english: And if that for every soul (that) wronged whatever (is) in the earth it (would) seek to ransom with it and they (will) confide the regret when they see the punishment But will be judged between them in justice and they (will) not (be) wronged

ayah: وَلَوۡ أَنَّ لِكُلِّ نَفۡسٖ ظَلَمَتۡ مَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَٱفۡتَدَتۡ بِهِۦۗ وَأَسَرُّواْ ٱلنَّدَامَةَ لَمَّا رَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَۖ وَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُم بِٱلۡقِسۡطِ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ

ayah: وَلَوۡ أَنَّ لِكُلِّ نَفۡسٖ ظَلَمَتۡ مَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَٱفۡتَدَتۡ بِهِۦۗ وَأَسَرُّواْ ٱلنَّدَامَةَ لَمَّا رَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَۖ وَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُم بِٱلۡقِسۡطِ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدۡ جَآءَتۡكُم مَّوۡعِظَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَشِفَآءٞ لِّمَا فِي ٱلصُّدُورِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nasu qad jaatkum maw'izatun min rabbikum washifaon lima fi al-suduri wahudan warahmatun lil'mu'minina
ayah_english: O mankind O mankind Verily has come to you an instruction from your Lord and a healing for what (is) in your breasts and guidance and mercy for the believers

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدۡ جَآءَتۡكُم مَّوۡعِظَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَشِفَآءٞ لِّمَا فِي ٱلصُّدُورِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nasu qad jaatkum maw'izatun min rabbikum washifaon lima fi al-suduri wahudan warahmatun lil'mu'minina

ayah: قُلۡ بِفَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ وَبِرَحۡمَتِهِۦ فَبِذَٰلِكَ فَلۡيَفۡرَحُواْ هُوَ خَيۡرٞ مِّمَّا يَجۡمَعُونَ
ayah_translit: qul bifadli al-lahi wabirahmatihi fabidhalika falyafrahu huwa khayrun mimma yajma'una
ayah_english: Say In the Bounty (of) Allah and in His Mercy so in that let them rejoice It (is) better than what they accumulate

ayah: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُم مَّآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُم مِّن رِّزۡقٖ فَجَعَلۡتُم مِّنۡهُ حَرَامٗا وَحَلَٰلٗا قُلۡ ءَآللَّهُ أَذِنَ لَكُمۡۖ أَمۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ تَفۡتَرُونَ
ayah_translit: qul ara-aytum ma anzala al-lahu lakum min riz'qin faja'altum min'hu haraman wahalalan qul allahu adhina lakum am ala al-lahi taftaruna
ayah_english: Say Have you seen what (has been) sent down (by) Allah for you of (the) provision and you have made of it unlawful and lawful Say Has Allah permitted [to] you or against Allah you invent (lies)

ayah: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُم مَّآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُم مِّن رِّزۡقٖ فَجَعَلۡتُم مِّنۡهُ حَرَامٗا وَحَلَٰلٗا قُلۡ ءَآللَّهُ أَذِنَ لَكُمۡۖ أَمۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ تَفۡتَرُونَ
ayah_translit: qul ara-aytum ma anzala al-lahu lakum min riz'qin faja'altum min'hu haraman wahalalan qul allahu adhina lakum am ala al-lahi taftaruna

ayah_english: Say Have you seen what (has been) sent down (by) Allah for you of (the) provision and you have made of it unlawful and lawful Say Has Allah permitted [to] you or against Allah you invent (lies)

ayah: وَمَا ظَنُّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wama zannu alladhina yaftaruna ala al-lahi al-kadhiba yawma al-qiyamati inna al-laha ladhu fadlin ala al-nasi walakinna aktharahum la yashkuruna
ayah_english: And what (will be the) assumption (of) those who invent against Allah the lie (on) the Day (of) the Judgment Indeed Allah (is) surely Full (of) Bounty (is) surely Full (of) Bounty to the mankind but most of them (are) not grateful

ayah: وَمَا ظَنُّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

ayah_english: And what (will be the) assumption (of) those who invent against Allah the lie (on) the Day (of) the Judgment Indeed Allah (is) surely Full (of) Bounty (is) surely Full (of) Bounty to the mankind but most of them (are) not grateful

ayah: وَمَا تَكُونُ فِي شَأۡنٖ وَمَا تَتۡلُواْ مِنۡهُ مِن قُرۡءَانٖ وَلَا تَعۡمَلُونَ مِنۡ عَمَلٍ إِلَّا كُنَّا عَلَيۡكُمۡ شُهُودًا إِذۡ تُفِيضُونَ فِيهِۚ وَمَا يَعۡزُبُ عَن رَّبِّكَ مِن مِّثۡقَالِ ذَرَّةٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَلَآ أَصۡغَرَ مِن ذَٰلِكَ وَلَآ أَكۡبَرَ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٖ مُّبِينٍ
ayah_translit: wama takunu fi shanin wama tatlu min'hu min qur'anin wala ta'maluna min amalin illa kunna alaykum shuhudan idh tufiduna fihi wama ya'zubu an rabbika min mith'qali dharratin fi al-ardi wala fi al-samai wala asghara min dhalika wala akbara illa fi kitabin mubinin
ayah_english: And not you are [in] any situation and not you recite of it from (the) Quran and not you do any deed except We are over you witnesses when you are engaged in it And not escapes from your Lord of (the) weight (of) an atom in the earth and not in the heavens and not smaller than that and not greater but (is) in a Record clear

ayah: وَمَا تَكُونُ فِي شَأۡنٖ وَمَا تَتۡلُواْ مِنۡهُ مِن قُرۡءَانٖ وَلَا تَعۡمَلُونَ مِنۡ عَمَلٍ إِلَّا كُنَّا عَلَيۡكُمۡ شُهُودًا إِذۡ تُفِيضُونَ فِيهِۚ وَمَا يَعۡزُبُ عَن رَّبِّكَ مِن مِّثۡقَالِ ذَرَّةٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَلَآ أَصۡغَرَ مِن ذَٰلِكَ وَلَآ أَكۡبَرَ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٖ مُّبِينٍ

ayah_translit: wama takunu fi shanin wama tatlu min'hu min qur'anin wala ta'maluna min amalin illa kunna alaykum shuhudan idh tufiduna fihi wama ya'zubu an rabbika min mith'qali dharratin fi al-ardi wala fi al-samai wala asghara min dhalika wala akbara illa fi kitabin mubinin

ayah: أَلَآ إِنَّ أَوۡلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ
ayah_translit: ala inna awliyaa al-lahi la khawfun alayhim wala hum yahzanuna
ayah_english: No doubt Indeed (the) friends (of) Allah (there will be) no fear upon then and not they will grieve

ayah: أَلَآ إِنَّ أَوۡلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَكَانُواْ يَتَّقُونَ
ayah_translit: alladhina amanu wakanu yattaquna
ayah_english: Those who believe and are conscious (of Allah)

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَكَانُواْ يَتَّقُونَ

ayah_translit: alladhina amanu wakanu yattaquna
ayah_english: Those who believe and are conscious (of Allah)

ayah: لَهُمُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ لَا تَبۡدِيلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
ayah_translit: lahumu al-bush'ra fi al-hayati al-dun'ya wafi al-akhirati la tabdila likalimati al-lahi dhalika huwa al-fawzu al-'azimu
ayah_english: For them (are) the glad tidings in the life (of) the world and in the Hereafter No change (is there) in the Words (of) Allah That is the success the great

ayah: وَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ قَوۡلُهُمۡۘ إِنَّ ٱلۡعِزَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعًاۚ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
ayah_translit: wala yahzunka qawluhum inna al-'izata lillahi jami'an huwa al-sami'u al-'alimu
ayah_english: And (let) not grieve you their speech Indeed the honor (belongs) to Allah all He (is) the All-Hearer the All-Knower

ayah: وَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ قَوۡلُهُمۡۘ إِنَّ ٱلۡعِزَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعًاۚ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

ayah: أَلَآ إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَمَا يَتَّبِعُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُرَكَآءَۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ وَإِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَخۡرُصُونَ
ayah_translit: ala inna lillahi man fi al-samawati waman fi al-ardi wama yattabi'u alladhina yad'una min duni al-lahi shurakaa in yattabi'una illa al-zana wa-in hum illa yakhrusuna
ayah_english: No doubt Indeed to Allah (belongs) whoever (is) in the heavens and whoever (is) in the earth And not follow those who invoke other than Allah other than Allah other than Allah partners Not they follow but the assumption and not they but guess

ayah: أَلَآ إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَمَا يَتَّبِعُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُرَكَآءَۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ وَإِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَخۡرُصُونَ

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ لِتَسۡكُنُواْ فِيهِ وَٱلنَّهَارَ مُبۡصِرًاۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَسۡمَعُونَ
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi ja'ala lakumu al-layla litaskunu fihi wal-nahara mub'siran inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yasma'una
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who made for you the night that you may rest in it and the day giving visibility Indeed in that surely (are) Signs for a people (who) listen

ayah: قَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗاۗ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۖ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّۖ لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنۡ عِندَكُم مِّن سُلۡطَٰنِۭ بِهَٰذَآۚ أَتَقُولُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: qalu ittakhadha al-lahu waladan sub'hanahu huwa al-ghaniyu lahu ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi in indakum min sul'tanin bihadha ataquluna ala al-lahi ma la ta'lamuna
ayah_english: They say Allah has taken Allah has taken a son Glory be to Him He (is) the Self-sufficient To Him (belongs) whatever (is) in the heavens and whatever (is) in the earth Not you have any authority for this Do you say about Allah what not you know

ayah: مَتَٰعٞ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا ثُمَّ إِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُهُمۡ ثُمَّ نُذِيقُهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلشَّدِيدَ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡفُرُونَ
ayah_translit: mata'un fi al-dun'ya thumma ilayna marji'uhum thumma nudhiquhumu al-'adhaba al-shadida bima kanu yakfuruna
ayah_english: An enjoyment in the world then to Us (is) their return then We will make them taste the punishment the severe because they used to disbelieve

ayah: ۞وَٱتۡلُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَبَأَ نُوحٍ إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِن كَانَ كَبُرَ عَلَيۡكُم مَّقَامِي وَتَذۡكِيرِي بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُ فَأَجۡمِعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَكُمۡ وَشُرَكَآءَكُمۡ ثُمَّ لَا يَكُنۡ أَمۡرُكُمۡ عَلَيۡكُمۡ غُمَّةٗ ثُمَّ ٱقۡضُوٓاْ إِلَيَّ وَلَا تُنظِرُونِ
ayah_translit: wa-ut'lu alayhim naba-a nuhin idh qala liqawmihi yaqawmi in kana kabura alaykum maqami watadhkiri biayati al-lahi fa'ala al-lahi tawakkaltu fa-ajmi'u amrakum washurakaakum thumma la yakun amrukum alaykum ghummatan thumma iq'du ilayya wala tunziruni
ayah_english: And recite to them the news (of) Nuh when he said to his people O my people If is hard on you my stay and my reminding the Signs of Allah the Signs of Allah then on Allah I put my trust So you all resolve your plan and your partners Then let not be let not be (in) your plan for you any doubt Then carry (it out) upon me and (do) not give me respite

ayah: ۞وَٱتۡلُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَبَأَ نُوحٍ إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِن كَانَ كَبُرَ عَلَيۡكُم مَّقَامِي وَتَذۡكِيرِي بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُ فَأَجۡمِعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَكُمۡ وَشُرَكَآءَكُمۡ ثُمَّ لَا يَكُنۡ أَمۡرُكُمۡ عَلَيۡكُمۡ غُمَّةٗ ثُمَّ ٱقۡضُوٓاْ إِلَيَّ وَلَا تُنظِرُونِ
ayah_translit: wa-ut'lu alayhim naba-a nuhin idh qala liqawmihi yaqawmi in kana kabura alaykum maqami watadhkiri biayati al-lahi fa'ala al-lahi tawakkaltu fa-ajmi'u amrakum washurakaakum thumma la yakun amrukum alaykum ghummatan thumma iq'du ilayya wala tunziruni

ayah: فَإِن تَوَلَّيۡتُمۡ فَمَا سَأَلۡتُكُم مِّنۡ أَجۡرٍۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ وَأُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-in tawallaytum fama sa-altukum min ajrin in ajriya illa ala al-lahi wa-umir'tu an akuna mina al-mus'limina
ayah_english: But if you turn away then not I have asked you any reward Not (is) my reward but on Allah and I have been commanded that I be of the Muslims

ayah_translit: fa-in tawallaytum fama sa-altukum min ajrin in ajriya illa ala al-lahi wa-umir'tu an akuna mina al-mus'limina

ayah_english: But if you turn away then not I have asked you any reward Not (is) my reward but on Allah and I have been commanded that I be of the Muslims

ayah: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ خَلَـٰٓئِفَ وَأَغۡرَقۡنَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَاۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ
ayah_translit: fakadhabuhu fanajjaynahu waman ma'ahu fi al-ful'ki waja'alnahum khalaifa wa-aghraqna alladhina kadhabu biayatina fa-unzur kayfa kana aqibatu al-mundharina
ayah_english: But they denied him so We saved him and (those) who (were) with him in the ship and We made them successors and We drowned those who denied Our Signs Then see how was (the) end (of) those who were warned

ayah: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ خَلَـٰٓئِفَ وَأَغۡرَقۡنَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَاۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ

ayah: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ خَلَـٰٓئِفَ وَأَغۡرَقۡنَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَاۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ

ayah_english: But they denied him so We saved him and (those) who (were) with him in the ship and We made them successors and We drowned those who denied Our Signs Then see how was (the) end (of) those who were warned

ayah: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ خَلَـٰٓئِفَ وَأَغۡرَقۡنَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَاۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ
ayah_translit: fakadhabuhu fanajjaynahu waman ma'ahu fi al-ful'ki waja'alnahum khalaifa wa-aghraqna alladhina kadhabu biayatina fa-unzur kayfa kana aqibatu al-mundharina
ayah_english: But they denied him so We saved him and (those) who (were) with him in the ship and We made them successors and We drowned those who denied Our Signs Then see how was (the) end (of) those who were warned

ayah: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ رُسُلًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِمۡ فَجَآءُوهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ فَمَا كَانُواْ لِيُؤۡمِنُواْ بِمَا كَذَّبُواْ بِهِۦ مِن قَبۡلُۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَطۡبَعُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدِينَ
ayah_translit: thumma ba'athna min ba'dihi rusulan ila qawmihim fajauhum bil-bayinati fama kanu liyu'minu bima kadhabu bihi min qablu kadhalika natba'u ala qulubi al-mu'tadina
ayah_english: Then We sent after him after him Messengers to their people and they came to them with clear proofs But not they were to believe what they had denied [it] before before Thus We seal [on] the hearts (of) the transgressors

ayah: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ رُسُلًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِمۡ فَجَآءُوهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ فَمَا كَانُواْ لِيُؤۡمِنُواْ بِمَا كَذَّبُواْ بِهِۦ مِن قَبۡلُۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَطۡبَعُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدِينَ

ayah_translit: thumma ba'athna min ba'dihi rusulan ila qawmihim fajauhum bil-bayinati fama kanu liyu'minu bima kadhabu bihi min qablu kadhalika natba'u ala qulubi al-mu'tadina

ayah: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِم مُّوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِۦ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ وَكَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا مُّجۡرِمِينَ
ayah_translit: thumma ba'athna min ba'dihim musa waharuna ila fir'awna wamala-ihi biayatina fa-is'takbaru wakanu qawman muj'rimina

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِنۡ عِندِنَا قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ
ayah_translit: falamma jaahumu al-haqu min indina qalu inna hadha lasih'run mubinun

ayah_translit: qala musa ataquluna lil'haqqi lamma jaakum asih'run hadha wala yuf'lihu al-sahiruna

ayah_english: Musa said Musa said Do you say about the truth when it has come to you Is this magic Is this magic But (will) not succeed the magicians

ayah: قَالَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَتَقُولُونَ لِلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَكُمۡۖ أَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَا وَلَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلسَّـٰحِرُونَ

ayah: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتَلۡفِتَنَا عَمَّا وَجَدۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ ءَابَآءَنَا وَتَكُونَ لَكُمَا ٱلۡكِبۡرِيَآءُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا نَحۡنُ لَكُمَا بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu aji'tana litalfitana amma wajadna alayhi abaana watakuna lakuma al-kib'riyau fi al-ardi wama nahnu lakuma bimu'minina
ayah_english: They said Have you come to us to turn us away from that we found on it our forefathers and you two (may) have and you two (may) have the greatness in the land And we (are) not And we (are) not (in) you two believers

ayah: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱئۡتُونِي بِكُلِّ سَٰحِرٍ عَلِيمٖ
ayah_translit: waqala fir'awnu i'tuni bikulli sahirin alimin
ayah_english: And Firaun said And Firaun said Bring to me every magician learned

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلۡقُواْ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلۡقُونَ
ayah_translit: falamma jaa al-saharatu qala lahum musa alqu ma antum mul'quna
ayah_english: So when came the magicians said to them Musa Throw whatever you (wish to) throw

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلۡقُواْ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلۡقُونَ
ayah_translit: falamma jaa al-saharatu qala lahum musa alqu ma antum mul'quna
ayah_english: So when came the magicians said to them Musa Throw whatever you (wish to) throw

ayah: فَلَمَّآ أَلۡقَوۡاْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ مَا جِئۡتُم بِهِ ٱلسِّحۡرُۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَيُبۡطِلُهُۥٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُصۡلِحُ عَمَلَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ
ayah_translit: falamma alqaw qala musa ma ji'tum bihi al-sih'ru inna al-laha sayub'tiluhu inna al-laha la yus'lihu amala al-muf'sidina
ayah_english: Then when they (had) thrown Musa said Musa said What you have brought [it] (is) the magic Indeed Allah will nullify it Indeed Allah (does) not amend the work (of) the corrupters

ayah: وَيُحِقُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
ayah_translit: wayuhiqqu al-lahu al-haqa bikalimatihi walaw kariha al-muj'rimuna
ayah_english: And Allah will establish And Allah will establish the truth by His words even if dislike it the criminals

ayah: فَمَآ ءَامَنَ لِمُوسَىٰٓ إِلَّا ذُرِّيَّةٞ مِّن قَوۡمِهِۦ عَلَىٰ خَوۡفٖ مِّن فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِمۡ أَن يَفۡتِنَهُمۡۚ وَإِنَّ فِرۡعَوۡنَ لَعَالٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ
ayah_translit: fama amana limusa illa dhurriyyatun min qawmihi ala khawfin min fir'awna wamala-ihim an yaftinahum wa-inna fir'awna la'alin fi al-ardi wa-innahu lamina al-mus'rifina
ayah_english: But none believed Musa except (the) offspring among his people for fear of Firaun and their chiefs lest they persecute them And indeed Firaun (was) a tyrant in the earth and indeed he (was) of the ones who commit excesses

ayah: فَمَآ ءَامَنَ لِمُوسَىٰٓ إِلَّا ذُرِّيَّةٞ مِّن قَوۡمِهِۦ عَلَىٰ خَوۡفٖ مِّن فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِمۡ أَن يَفۡتِنَهُمۡۚ وَإِنَّ فِرۡعَوۡنَ لَعَالٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ

ayah_english: But none believed Musa except (the) offspring among his people for fear of Firaun and their chiefs lest they persecute them And indeed Firaun (was) a tyrant in the earth and indeed he (was) of the ones who commit excesses

ayah_english: But none believed Musa except (the) offspring among his people for fear of Firaun and their chiefs lest they persecute them And indeed Firaun (was) a tyrant in the earth and indeed he (was) of the ones who commit excesses

ayah: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِن كُنتُمۡ ءَامَنتُم بِٱللَّهِ فَعَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلُوٓاْ إِن كُنتُم مُّسۡلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: waqala musa yaqawmi in kuntum amantum bil-lahi fa'alayhi tawakkalu in kuntum mus'limina
ayah_english: And Musa said And Musa said O my people If you have believed in Allah then on Him put your trust if you are Muslims

ayah: فَقَالُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوَكَّلۡنَا رَبَّنَا لَا تَجۡعَلۡنَا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: faqalu ala al-lahi tawakkalna rabbana la taj'alna fit'natan lil'qawmi al-zalimina
ayah_english: Then they said Upon Allah we put our trust Our Lord! (Do) not make us a trial for the people the wrongdoers

ayah: وَنَجِّنَا بِرَحۡمَتِكَ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_translit: wanajjina birahmatika mina al-qawmi al-kafirina

ayah: وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَأَخِيهِ أَن تَبَوَّءَا لِقَوۡمِكُمَا بِمِصۡرَ بُيُوتٗا وَٱجۡعَلُواْ بُيُوتَكُمۡ قِبۡلَةٗ وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-awhayna ila musa wa-akhihi an tabawwaa liqawmikuma bimis'ra buyutan wa-ij'alu buyutakum qib'latan wa-aqimu al-salata wabashiri al-mu'minina
ayah_english: And We inspired to Musa and his brother that Settle your people in Egypt (in) houses and make your houses (as) places of worship and establish the prayer And give glad tidings (to) the believers

ayah_translit: wa-awhayna ila musa wa-akhihi an tabawwaa liqawmikuma bimis'ra buyutan wa-ij'alu buyutakum qib'latan wa-aqimu al-salata wabashiri al-mu'minina
ayah_english: And We inspired to Musa and his brother that Settle your people in Egypt (in) houses and make your houses (as) places of worship and establish the prayer And give glad tidings (to) the believers

ayah: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ ءَاتَيۡتَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَأَهُۥ زِينَةٗ وَأَمۡوَٰلٗا فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا رَبَّنَا لِيُضِلُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِكَۖ رَبَّنَا ٱطۡمِسۡ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ وَٱشۡدُدۡ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَلَا يُؤۡمِنُواْ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ
ayah_translit: waqala musa rabbana innaka atayta fir'awna wamala-ahu zinatan wa-amwalan fi al-hayati al-dun'ya rabbana liyudillu an sabilika rabbana it'mis ala amwalihim wa-ush'dud ala qulubihim fala yu'minu hatta yarawu al-'adhaba al-alima
ayah_english: And Musa said And Musa said Our Lord Indeed, You have given Firaun and his chiefs splendor and wealth in the life (of) the world Our Lord That they may lead astray from Your way Our Lord Destroy [on] their wealth and harden [on] their hearts so (that) not they believe until they see the punishment the painful

ayah: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ ءَاتَيۡتَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَأَهُۥ زِينَةٗ وَأَمۡوَٰلٗا فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا رَبَّنَا لِيُضِلُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِكَۖ رَبَّنَا ٱطۡمِسۡ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ وَٱشۡدُدۡ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَلَا يُؤۡمِنُواْ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ
ayah_translit: waqala musa rabbana innaka atayta fir'awna wamala-ahu zinatan wa-amwalan fi al-hayati al-dun'ya rabbana liyudillu an sabilika rabbana it'mis ala amwalihim wa-ush'dud ala qulubihim fala yu'minu hatta yarawu al-'adhaba al-alima
ayah_english: And Musa said And Musa said Our Lord Indeed, You have given Firaun and his chiefs splendor and wealth in the life (of) the world Our Lord That they may lead astray from Your way Our Lord Destroy [on] their wealth and harden [on] their hearts so (that) not they believe until they see the punishment the painful

ayah: قَالَ قَدۡ أُجِيبَت دَّعۡوَتُكُمَا فَٱسۡتَقِيمَا وَلَا تَتَّبِعَآنِّ سَبِيلَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: qala qad ujibat da'watukuma fa-is'taqima wala tattabi'anni sabila alladhina la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: He said Verily has been answered (the) invocation of both of you So you two (keep to the) straight way And (do) not follow (the) way (of) those who (do) not know

ayah: ۞وَجَٰوَزۡنَا بِبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ فَأَتۡبَعَهُمۡ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَجُنُودُهُۥ بَغۡيٗا وَعَدۡوًاۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَدۡرَكَهُ ٱلۡغَرَقُ قَالَ ءَامَنتُ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنَتۡ بِهِۦ بَنُوٓاْ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wajawazna bibani is'raila al-bahra fa-atba'ahum fir'awnu wajunuduhu baghyan wa'adwan hatta idha adrakahu al-gharaqu qala amantu annahu la ilaha illa alladhi amanat bihi banu is'raila wa-ana mina al-mus'limina
ayah_english: And We took across (the) Children (of) Israel the sea and followed them Firaun and his hosts (in) rebellion and enmity until when overtook him the drowning he said I believe that (there is) no god except the One in Whom believe in Whom believe the Children of Israel the Children of Israel and I am of the Muslims

ayah: ۞وَجَٰوَزۡنَا بِبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ فَأَتۡبَعَهُمۡ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَجُنُودُهُۥ بَغۡيٗا وَعَدۡوًاۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَدۡرَكَهُ ٱلۡغَرَقُ قَالَ ءَامَنتُ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنَتۡ بِهِۦ بَنُوٓاْ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wajawazna bibani is'raila al-bahra fa-atba'ahum fir'awnu wajunuduhu baghyan wa'adwan hatta idha adrakahu al-gharaqu qala amantu annahu la ilaha illa alladhi amanat bihi banu is'raila wa-ana mina al-mus'limina
ayah_english: And We took across (the) Children (of) Israel the sea and followed them Firaun and his hosts (in) rebellion and enmity until when overtook him the drowning he said I believe that (there is) no god except the One in Whom believe in Whom believe the Children of Israel the Children of Israel and I am of the Muslims

ayah: ءَآلۡـَٰٔنَ وَقَدۡ عَصَيۡتَ قَبۡلُ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ
ayah_translit: al'ana waqad asayta qablu wakunta mina al-muf'sidina
ayah_english: Now And verily you (had) disobeyed before and you were of the corrupters

ayah: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ نُنَجِّيكَ بِبَدَنِكَ لِتَكُونَ لِمَنۡ خَلۡفَكَ ءَايَةٗۚ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا لَغَٰفِلُونَ
ayah_translit: fal-yawma nunajjika bibadanika litakuna liman khalfaka ayatan wa-inna kathiran mina al-nasi an ayatina laghafiluna
ayah_english: So today We will save you in your body that you may be for (those) who succeed you a sign And indeed many among the mankind of Our Signs (are) surely heedless

ayah: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ نُنَجِّيكَ بِبَدَنِكَ لِتَكُونَ لِمَنۡ خَلۡفَكَ ءَايَةٗۚ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا لَغَٰفِلُونَ

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ بَوَّأۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ مُبَوَّأَ صِدۡقٖ وَرَزَقۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ فَمَا ٱخۡتَلَفُواْ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡعِلۡمُۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقۡضِي بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فِيمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ
ayah_translit: walaqad bawwana bani is'raila mubawwa-a sid'qin warazaqnahum mina al-tayibati fama ikh'talafu hatta jaahumu al-'il'mu inna rabbaka yaqdi baynahum yawma al-qiyamati fima kanu fihi yakhtalifuna
ayah_english: And verily We settled (the) Children (of) Israel (in) a settlement honorable and We provided them with the good things and not they differ until came to them the knowledge Indeed your Lord will judge between them (on) the Day (of) the Resurrection concerning what they used (to) [in it] differ

ayah: فَإِن كُنتَ فِي شَكّٖ مِّمَّآ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ فَسۡـَٔلِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَقۡرَءُونَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِن قَبۡلِكَۚ لَقَدۡ جَآءَكَ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-in kunta fi shakkin mimma anzalna ilayka fasali alladhina yaqrauna al-kitaba min qablika laqad jaaka al-haqu min rabbika fala takunanna mina al-mum'tarina
ayah_english: So if you are in doubt of what We have revealed to you then ask those who (have been) reading the Book before you before you Verily has come to you the truth from your Lord so (do) not be among the doubters

ayah: فَإِن كُنتَ فِي شَكّٖ مِّمَّآ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ فَسۡـَٔلِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَقۡرَءُونَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِن قَبۡلِكَۚ لَقَدۡ جَآءَكَ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

ayah: وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ
ayah_translit: wala takunanna mina alladhina kadhabu biayati al-lahi fatakuna mina al-khasirina
ayah_english: And (do) not be of those who deny (the) Signs of Allah (the) Signs of Allah then you will be among the losers

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ حَقَّتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina haqqat alayhim kalimatu rabbika la yu'minuna
ayah_english: Indeed those [whom] has become due on them (the) Word (of) your Lord will not believe

ayah: وَلَوۡ جَآءَتۡهُمۡ كُلُّ ءَايَةٍ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ
ayah_translit: walaw jaathum kullu ayatin hatta yarawu al-'adhaba al-alima
ayah_english: Even if comes to them every Sign until they see the punishment the painful
