ayah: فَلَوۡلَا كَانَتۡ قَرۡيَةٌ ءَامَنَتۡ فَنَفَعَهَآ إِيمَٰنُهَآ إِلَّا قَوۡمَ يُونُسَ لَمَّآ ءَامَنُواْ كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡخِزۡيِ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَمَتَّعۡنَٰهُمۡ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ
ayah_translit: falawla kanat qaryatun amanat fanafa'aha imanuha illa qawma yunusa lamma amanu kashafna anhum adhaba al-khiz'yi fi al-hayati al-dun'ya wamatta'nahum ila hinin
ayah_english: So why not was any town that believed and benefited it its faith except the people (of) Yunus When they believed We removed from them (the) punishment (of) the disgrace in the life of the world and We granted them enjoyment for a time

ayah: فَلَوۡلَا كَانَتۡ قَرۡيَةٌ ءَامَنَتۡ فَنَفَعَهَآ إِيمَٰنُهَآ إِلَّا قَوۡمَ يُونُسَ لَمَّآ ءَامَنُواْ كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡخِزۡيِ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَمَتَّعۡنَٰهُمۡ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

ayah_english: So why not was any town that believed and benefited it its faith except the people (of) Yunus When they believed We removed from them (the) punishment (of) the disgrace in the life of the world and We granted them enjoyment for a time

ayah: فَلَوۡلَا كَانَتۡ قَرۡيَةٌ ءَامَنَتۡ فَنَفَعَهَآ إِيمَٰنُهَآ إِلَّا قَوۡمَ يُونُسَ لَمَّآ ءَامَنُواْ كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡخِزۡيِ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَمَتَّعۡنَٰهُمۡ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

ayah: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَأٓمَنَ مَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كُلُّهُمۡ جَمِيعًاۚ أَفَأَنتَ تُكۡرِهُ ٱلنَّاسَ حَتَّىٰ يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: walaw shaa rabbuka laamana man fi al-ardi kulluhum jami'an afa-anta tuk'rihu al-nasa hatta yakunu mu'minina
ayah_english: And if (had) willed your Lord surely (would) have believed who (are) in the earth all of them together Then will you compel the mankind until they become believers

ayah: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَأٓمَنَ مَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كُلُّهُمۡ جَمِيعًاۚ أَفَأَنتَ تُكۡرِهُ ٱلنَّاسَ حَتَّىٰ يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

ayah_english: And if (had) willed your Lord surely (would) have believed who (are) in the earth all of them together Then will you compel the mankind until they become believers

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ لِنَفۡسٍ أَن تُؤۡمِنَ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَيَجۡعَلُ ٱلرِّجۡسَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: wama kana linafsin an tu'mina illa bi-idh'ni al-lahi wayaj'alu al-rij'sa ala alladhina la ya'qiluna
ayah_english: And not is for a soul to believe except by (the) permission (of) Allah And He will place the wrath on those who (do) not use reason

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ لِنَفۡسٍ أَن تُؤۡمِنَ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَيَجۡعَلُ ٱلرِّجۡسَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ لِنَفۡسٍ أَن تُؤۡمِنَ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَيَجۡعَلُ ٱلرِّجۡسَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: wama kana linafsin an tu'mina illa bi-idh'ni al-lahi wayaj'alu al-rij'sa ala alladhina la ya'qiluna
ayah_english: And not is for a soul to believe except by (the) permission (of) Allah And He will place the wrath on those who (do) not use reason

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ لِنَفۡسٍ أَن تُؤۡمِنَ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَيَجۡعَلُ ٱلرِّجۡسَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

ayah: قُلِ ٱنظُرُواْ مَاذَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَا تُغۡنِي ٱلۡأٓيَٰتُ وَٱلنُّذُرُ عَن قَوۡمٖ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: quli unzuru madha fi al-samawati wal-ardi wama tugh'ni al-ayatu wal-nudhuru an qawmin la yu'minuna
ayah_english: Say See what (is) in the heavens and the earth But not will avail the Signs and the warners to a people (who do) not believe

ayah: فَهَلۡ يَنتَظِرُونَ إِلَّا مِثۡلَ أَيَّامِ ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ قُلۡ فَٱنتَظِرُوٓاْ إِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُنتَظِرِينَ
ayah_translit: fahal yantaziruna illa mith'la ayyami alladhina khalaw min qablihim qul fa-intaziru inni ma'akum mina al-muntazirina
ayah_english: Then do they wait except like the days (of) those who passed away before them before them Say Then wait indeed, I (am) with you among the ones who wait

ayah: فَهَلۡ يَنتَظِرُونَ إِلَّا مِثۡلَ أَيَّامِ ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ قُلۡ فَٱنتَظِرُوٓاْ إِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُنتَظِرِينَ

ayah_english: Then do they wait except like the days (of) those who passed away before them before them Say Then wait indeed, I (am) with you among the ones who wait

ayah: فَهَلۡ يَنتَظِرُونَ إِلَّا مِثۡلَ أَيَّامِ ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ قُلۡ فَٱنتَظِرُوٓاْ إِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُنتَظِرِينَ

ayah: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّي رُسُلَنَا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۚ كَذَٰلِكَ حَقًّا عَلَيۡنَا نُنجِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: thumma nunajji rusulana wa-alladhina amanu kadhalika haqqan alayna nunji al-mu'minina
ayah_english: Then We will save Our Messengers and those who believe Thus (it is) an obligation upon Us (that) We save the believers

ayah: قُلۡ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِن كُنتُمۡ فِي شَكّٖ مِّن دِينِي فَلَآ أَعۡبُدُ ٱلَّذِينَ تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَٰكِنۡ أَعۡبُدُ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِي يَتَوَفَّىٰكُمۡۖ وَأُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: qul yaayyuha al-nasu in kuntum fi shakkin min dini fala a'budu alladhina ta'buduna min duni al-lahi walakin a'budu al-laha alladhi yatawaffakum wa-umir'tu an akuna mina al-mu'minina
ayah_english: Say O (mankind) (O) mankind If you are in doubt of my religion then not I worship those whom you worship besides Allah besides Allah besides Allah but I worship Allah the One Who causes you to die And I am commanded that I be of the believers

ayah_english: Say O (mankind) (O) mankind If you are in doubt of my religion then not I worship those whom you worship besides Allah besides Allah besides Allah but I worship Allah the One Who causes you to die And I am commanded that I be of the believers

ayah: وَأَنۡ أَقِمۡ وَجۡهَكَ لِلدِّينِ حَنِيفٗا وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-an aqim wajhaka lilddini hanifan wala takunanna mina al-mush'rikina
ayah_english: And that Direct your face to the religion upright and (do) not be of the polytheists

ayah_translit: wa-an aqim wajhaka lilddini hanifan wala takunanna mina al-mush'rikina
ayah_english: And that Direct your face to the religion upright and (do) not be of the polytheists

ayah: وَلَا تَدۡعُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُكَ وَلَا يَضُرُّكَۖ فَإِن فَعَلۡتَ فَإِنَّكَ إِذٗا مِّنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wala tad'u min duni al-lahi ma la yanfa'uka wala yadurruka fa-in fa'alta fa-innaka idhan mina al-zalimina
ayah_english: And (do) not invoke besides Allah besides Allah besides Allah what (will) not benefit you and not harm you But if you did so indeed, you then (will be) of the wrongdoers

ayah_english: And (do) not invoke besides Allah besides Allah besides Allah what (will) not benefit you and not harm you But if you did so indeed, you then (will be) of the wrongdoers

ayah: وَلَا تَدۡعُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُكَ وَلَا يَضُرُّكَۖ فَإِن فَعَلۡتَ فَإِنَّكَ إِذٗا مِّنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wala tad'u min duni al-lahi ma la yanfa'uka wala yadurruka fa-in fa'alta fa-innaka idhan mina al-zalimina
ayah_english: And (do) not invoke besides Allah besides Allah besides Allah what (will) not benefit you and not harm you But if you did so indeed, you then (will be) of the wrongdoers

ayah: وَإِن يَمۡسَسۡكَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرّٖ فَلَا كَاشِفَ لَهُۥٓ إِلَّا هُوَۖ وَإِن يُرِدۡكَ بِخَيۡرٖ فَلَا رَآدَّ لِفَضۡلِهِۦۚ يُصِيبُ بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_translit: wa-in yamsaska al-lahu bidurrin fala kashifa lahu illa huwa wa-in yurid'ka bikhayrin fala radda lifadlihi yusibu bihi man yashau min ibadihi wahuwa al-ghafuru al-rahimu
ayah_english: And if Allah touches you Allah touches you with adversity (there is) no remover of it except Him and if He intends for you any good then (there is) no repeller (of) His Bounty He causes it to reach He causes it to reach whom He wills of His slaves And He (is) the Oft-Forgiving the Most Merciful

ayah: وَإِن يَمۡسَسۡكَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرّٖ فَلَا كَاشِفَ لَهُۥٓ إِلَّا هُوَۖ وَإِن يُرِدۡكَ بِخَيۡرٖ فَلَا رَآدَّ لِفَضۡلِهِۦۚ يُصِيبُ بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

ayah: وَإِن يَمۡسَسۡكَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرّٖ فَلَا كَاشِفَ لَهُۥٓ إِلَّا هُوَۖ وَإِن يُرِدۡكَ بِخَيۡرٖ فَلَا رَآدَّ لِفَضۡلِهِۦۚ يُصِيبُ بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

ayah_english: And if Allah touches you Allah touches you with adversity (there is) no remover of it except Him and if He intends for you any good then (there is) no repeller (of) His Bounty He causes it to reach He causes it to reach whom He wills of His slaves And He (is) the Oft-Forgiving the Most Merciful

ayah: قُلۡ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدۡ جَآءَكُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكُمۡۖ فَمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَهۡتَدِي لِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَإِنَّمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيۡهَاۖ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ عَلَيۡكُم بِوَكِيلٖ
ayah_translit: qul yaayyuha al-nasu qad jaakumu al-haqu min rabbikum famani ih'tada fa-innama yahtadi linafsihi waman dalla fa-innama yadillu alayha wama ana alaykum biwakilin
ayah_english: Say O mankind O mankind Verily has come to you the truth from your Lord So whoever (is) guided then only (he is) guided for his soul and whoever goes astray then only he strays against it And I am not And I am not over you a guardian

ayah: قُلۡ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدۡ جَآءَكُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكُمۡۖ فَمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَهۡتَدِي لِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَإِنَّمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيۡهَاۖ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ عَلَيۡكُم بِوَكِيلٖ

ayah_translit: qul yaayyuha al-nasu qad jaakumu al-haqu min rabbikum famani ih'tada fa-innama yahtadi linafsihi waman dalla fa-innama yadillu alayha wama ana alaykum biwakilin

ayah: وَٱتَّبِعۡ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَٱصۡبِرۡ حَتَّىٰ يَحۡكُمَ ٱللَّهُۚ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-ittabi' ma yuha ilayka wa-is'bir hatta yahkuma al-lahu wahuwa khayru al-hakimina
ayah_english: And follow what is revealed to you and be patient until Allah gives judgment Allah gives judgment And He (is) the Best (of) the Judges
